Featured Speakers

Bosko Kante

CEO

HiiiWAV

CEO and Co-founder of ElectroSpit Inc., and President, Founder, and Executive Director of HiiiWAV. Grammy-winning music producer and mechanical engineer who invented the patented ElectroSpit ESX-1 TalkBox. Through HiiiWAV, he empowers artists with AI and VR skills to thrive in the digital age.
